description: I'm currently looking for new opportunities. Located in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada. Thank you for checking out my site. This is where I post side projects.

I focus on front-end development. I love <0>JavaScript</0>, <1>TypeScript</1>, and <2>React</2>. I am also interested in Data Visualization and Data Science. In my past life, I worked in television as a camera operator. In my spare time I work on projects, run, swim and photography.

Solaroid.title: Solaroid
Solaroid.description: Solaroid is an 'Instagramish' photo sharing site using the NASA API. Built over a weekend for a coding competition. Implemented an infinite scrolling feature, which dynamically loads more photos once you scroll to the bottom of the page. A user can like, and share photos.

jamiekaram.dev.title: jamiekaram.dev
jamiekaram.dev.description: Version 2 of my personal website. This was a great opportunity to further develop my UI and Figma experience.

Beverage Genetics Flavour Profile.title: Beverage Genetics Flavour Profile
Beverage Genetics Flavour Profile.description: Beverage Genetics recommends coffee flavours based on a customer's flavour profile. I designed and developed an easy to use survey that can be easily modified by the owner.

Instagram Scraper.title: Instagram Scraper
Instagram Scraper.description: Scrape 'likes' and other pertinent information. Create a model with the data and calculate the optimal time to post on Instagram and maximize likes.

How Old Were They?.title: How Old Were They?
How Old Were They?.description: Find out the age of an actor during the making of a movie they are in. This was my first project outside of Bootcamp. I am definetly going to revisit and add more features.
